short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StorkyApp sessions recorder that records screen activity, camera, mic, tab, speakers for later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows educators to record their online live sessions that is done via StorkyApp and auto-inserts it in the proper timeline slot.

For more information please visit our website: 
www.storky.app
